name: Yummy yummy gem gems
description:
Introduction

The aim is to see how long you can last and how many gems you can pick up.  There is no win situation, you can last as long as you can. I have only managed around 50, so good luck.

Look out for the power ups which are coloured circles. 

Controls

Menu - Keyboard Escape

Move- Keyboard AWSD/Arrow keys or Controller left stick

Development

I recently went on holiday to Scotland and in the evenings I spent messing about with this game. I wanted to make something more competitive than I usually do, this is the first time I have made a simple AI to shoot. Simple graphics also as I only had a few days.
